author: Robyn Dixon, Ellen Francis
title: Zelensky says he’s Russia’s ‘No. 1 target’ but will stay in Kyiv — and he’s calling for talks with Putin
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky appealed to Russian leader Vladimir Putin to sit down with him for talks, but Russia insisted on goals that effectively mean toppling Zelensky’s government.
content:
His family is the No. 2 target, he said, but also remains in Ukraine. My family is not traitors, but citizens of Ukraine. But I have no right to say where they are now, Zelensky said.
The Ukrainian … [+2230 chars]
